articles.title: What rising Covid-19 infections in the UK and Europe could mean for the US - CNN
articles.description: Two weeks after the United Kingdom dropped its last remaining Covid-19 mitigation measure -- a requirement that people who test positive for the virus isolate for five days -- the country is seeing cases and hospitalizations climb once again.
